meanings.definition: Not having any content removed or censored.
meanings.sent1: The book was unexpurgated, containing all the original words.
meanings.sent2: The unexpurgated version of the movie included all the intense scenes.
meanings.sent3: The unexpurgated report shocked the readers with its raw honesty.
meanings.sent4: Her unexpurgated emotions spilled out in a burst of tears.
meanings.sent5: The unexpurgated truth was finally revealed, leaving no room for doubt.

meanings.definition: Not cleaned up or made more acceptable by removing parts deemed offensive or inappropriate.
meanings.sent1: The unexpurgated language in the play made some audience members uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The unexpurgated version of the song contained explicit lyrics.
meanings.sent3: His unexpurgated jokes always pushed the boundaries of good taste.
meanings.sent4: The unexpurgated reality of the situation hit him hard.
meanings.sent5: The unexpurgated artwork shocked viewers with its boldness.
